Module net.minestom.server

Package net.minestom.server.event.inventory

@NotNullByDefault package net.minestom.server.event.inventory
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    net.minestom.server.event
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CreativeInventoryActionEvent
    Called when a player interacts with an item in the creative menu
    InventoryClickEvent
    Called after InventoryPreClickEvent, this event cannot be cancelled and items related to the click are already moved.
    InventoryCloseEvent
    Called when an AbstractInventory is closed by a player.
    InventoryItemChangeEvent
    Called when AbstractInventory.setItemStack(int, ItemStack) is being invoked.
    InventoryOpenEvent
    Called when a player open an AbstractInventory.
    InventoryPreClickEvent
    Called before InventoryClickEvent, used to potentially cancel the click.
